entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9 except minus 4 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 9 except minus 4 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18 except minus 14 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 18 except minus 14 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9 except minus 3 near the Alberta border.
